body_html:
The GPU version can be compiled without problems now. If you want to try it out, just feel free to clone my repo here and build it yourself. BTW, the conda packages will be out soon.
@deo1 Yes, I'm working on that. Actually that is what @TestItOnlyOnce and I are doing. Luckily, this time the changes are based on the master branch and the changes are well split for review. The new PR is listed as #2402.

body:
The GPU version can be compiled without problems now. If you want to try it out, just feel free to clone my repo [here](https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch/tree/new_version) and build it yourself. BTW, the conda packages will be out soon. 
@deo1 Yes, I'm working on that. Actually that is what @TestItOnlyOnce and I are doing. Luckily, this time the changes are based on the master branch and the changes are well split for review. The new PR is listed as #2402.
